inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) class I-III
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with chronic indwelling Foley catheterization or suprapubic catheterization
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of neurogenic bladder and is on a suprapubic catheter, which makes them ineligible for the study.
